name: Movies Named by Year Multiple Choice Quiz | Something in Common | 10 Questions

questions.text: This movie stars Edmond O'Brien, Michael Redgrave, and Donald Pleasence. It's about a future totalitarian society, and one man's rebellion to it by falling in love.
questions.explanation:
1984.

	Based of the novel by George Orwell. The title year was simply the year Orwell wrote the book, 1948, with the last two digits swapped.

questions.text: This comedy shows the paranoia growing in California the week after the Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor, HI.
questions.explanation:
1941.

	Starring John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Ned Beatty, and Tim Matheson.

questions.text: A mysterious monolith is found on the moon just before a manned mission to Jupiter goes awry, when the computer starts killing the crew.
Sequel to the previous question. A following mission goes to Jupiter to discover what went wrong. They also find the true purpose of the monolith.
questions.explanation:
2010.

	Starring Roy Scheider and John Lithgow.

questions.text: Christopher Columbus discovers America. (Stars Gerard Depardieu.)
A 1972 film of a Broadway musical comedy. It's about the events leading to the writing of the Declaration of Independence.
questions.explanation:
1776.

	Starring William Daniels, Ken Howard, and Blythe Danner.

questions.text: This 1976 Robert De Niro and Gerard Depardieu film follows the lives of two Italian men from boyhood to manhood, as their country is affected by Fascism and Communism. The title is the year that the story starts.

Matthew Broderick stars in this movie set during the 1st World War. The residents of a small Texas town are torn not only by effects of the war, but a influenza epidemic sweeping the town and the country.
This 1966 blatantly incorrect historically (or pre-historically) film details the adventures of a caveman Tumak as he faces volcanos, dinosaurs, and unfriendly tribes. '___________ Years, B.C.'
questions.explanation:
One Million & Million & 1000000 & 1,000,000.

	Stars Raquel Welch sporting a fur bikini! Yow!

questions.text: This documentary follows the bands Sonic Youth and Nirvana as they toured Europe.
questions.explanation:
1991.

	Full Title: '1991: The Year Punk Broke'
